hibernate-mapping.sql-query: UPDATE PerformerAKA SET performerId = :newId WHERE performerId = :oldId
UPDATE ChartDetail SET performerId = :newId WHERE performerId = :oldId
UPDATE TopChartDetail SET performerId = :newId WHERE performerId = :oldId
UPDATE Song SET performerId = :newId WHERE performerId = :oldId
UPDATE Track SET performerId = :newId WHERE performerId = :oldId
UPDATE ChartDetail SET songId = :newId WHERE songId = :oldId
UPDATE TopChartDetail SET songId = :newId WHERE songId = :oldId
UPDATE SongAKA SET songId = :newId WHERE songId = :oldId
UPDATE Track SET songId = :newId WHERE songId = :oldId
